articles.title: Rohingya refugees reach western Indonesia on decrepit boat - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: More than 2,000 Rohingya are believed to have attempted the risky journey to Southeast Asian countries in 2022.
articles.content:
About 250 desperate Rohingya refugees are afloat in the Andaman Sea after their attempt to land in Indonesia was rejected.
